title: World Capitals â€” Easy Level
description: A short, easy quiz about world capitals. Each question has four answer choices and exactly one correct answer. Great for a warm-up, classroom activity, or quick self-check.

title: World Flags
description: A brief quiz for recognizing national flags or their distinctive features. Each question asks you to identify a country based on a short description of its flag or prominent symbol.

title: Inventors & Inventions
description: A short quiz that tests basic knowledge about well-known inventors and the inventions or discoveries they are famous for. Good for classroom warm-ups or general knowledge practice.

title: Programming Basics
description: A short quiz covering fundamental programming concepts: algorithms, data structures, databases, version control, HTTP, languages, and functional programming. Designed for beginners and as a quick refresher.
